addExercise.infoCreateExercise: To edit, add, or delete a set, simply swipe the exercise block to the left or tap on the exercise block.

modalAddRepsRest.helpTextReps: Specify the number of repetitions in the exercise.
modalAddRepsRest.helpTextRest: Set the rest time after completing the exercise.
modalAddRepsRest.helpTextExerciseTime: Set the exercise duration; if not needed, leave the values at zero.
